#summary Testing voting options through a Google Gadget called Moderator.

== How this works ==
Submit an idea or suggestions and vote or reply to it. We're just testing this for now, but feel free to get creative with ideas.

Non-members can post, but (I believe) are required to login to Google (to be confirmed).
